chunks.zh: 2 月最后一天，祝自己快乐
chunks.en: Happy to myself on the last day of February

chunks.zh:
2 月最后一天，祝自己生日快乐。

30 了，没成家，没立业，没车，没房，没女朋友，没社交，俨然活成了自己曾经讨厌的模样。

以前，虽然比不上那些大佬，但也算是一小群人中的佼佼者。

可现在，只是个小小职员，上也上不去，跳也不好跳，还要整天担心被裁员。

如果那年，我没有乱跳槽，现在也不至于这样啊。

如果那年，在「爱我的」和「我爱的」两个女孩中间，我没有选择后者，现在小孩估计都能跑了，那可是一个在我没车没房没存款的时候，不要彩礼还愿意跟我一起打拼攒钱买房的好女孩啊。。。

可惜，人生没有如果，再也遇不到那个贵人，再也遇不到那个女孩...

不再去想如果了...

好在，自己父母健康，自己这份工作暂时还没丢，自己还有一点点积蓄，自己还有一点点梦想。

趁梦想还没丢，趁自己还没放弃，继续努力吧，再拼一把。

干中学，学中干，加油，自己。
chunks.en:
Happy birthday to myself on the last day of February.

I am 30, unmarried, without a career, no car, no house, no girlfriend, no social life, and I have become the person I used to hate.

In the past, although I couldn't compare to those big shots, I was still a top player in a small group.

But now, I am just a small employee, unable to be promoted, not easy to change jobs, and always worried about being laid off.

If I hadn't changed jobs so frequently that year, I wouldn't be in this situation now.

If that year, between the two girls, "the one who loved me" and "the one I loved", I hadn't chosen the latter, my child might be able to run now. That was a good girl who was willing to work hard and save money to buy a house with me when I didn't have a car, a house, or any savings... 

Unfortunately, life has no ifs. I will never meet that benefactor again, and I will never meet that girl again...

I will stop thinking about ifs...

Fortunately, my parents are healthy, my job hasn't been lost for the time being, I still have a little savings, and I still have a little dream.

Before my dream is lost, before I give up, let's keep working hard, and fight again.

Learn by doing, and do while learning. Come on, myself.

chunks.zh: 牛马三件套了解一下「车贷房贷孩子」，你这都没有被套牢，属实遥遥领先了，还担心个锤子裁员
chunks.en: Get to know the three-piece set of the working class: "car loans, mortgage loans, and children". You are not trapped by any of these, you are really far ahead. Why worry about being laid off?

chunks.zh: 有没有一种可能，你选一个爱你的，结果后面还是掏钱掏心费力生了孩子一地鸡毛人生的路有很多种，你不要美化你没走过的路
chunks.en: Is it possible that if you chose someone who loved you, you would still spend money and effort to have a child, leading to a messy life? There are many paths in life, don't romanticize the path you didn't take.

chunks.zh: 已经战胜 99%的牛马了，加油！
chunks.en: You have already defeated 99% of the working class, keep it up!

chunks.zh: 生日快乐。我才意识到二月只有 28 天，异地距离下次相见还有 2 个月，感觉时间一下子又快了 3 天，很开心。
chunks.en: Happy birthday. I just realized February only has 28 days, and it's 2 months until we meet again. I feel like time has suddenly sped up by 3 days. I'm very happy.

chunks.zh: 生日快乐，靓仔
chunks.en: Happy birthday, handsome boy

chunks.zh: 生日快乐，bro
chunks.en: Happy birthday, bro

chunks.zh: @fakecoder 这是我最爱的一集，也是整部剧里最爱的一个片段
chunks.en: @fakecoder This is my favorite episode, and also my favorite scene in the whole show

chunks.zh: 嗨，生日快乐
chunks.en: Hi, happy birthday

chunks.zh: 生快
chunks.en: Happy birthday

chunks.zh: 加油，生日快乐
chunks.en: Come on, happy birthday

chunks.zh: 加油，我 29 周岁未满 30 周，无房无车无老婆孩子无存款，普通小职员，不想努力只想躺平，祝你生日快乐
chunks.en: Come on, I am not yet 30 years old, no house, no car, no wife, no children, no savings, an ordinary small employee, I don't want to work hard, I just want to lie down. Happy birthday to you.

chunks.zh: 生日快乐。我后天过，过了就 28 了。一样迷茫，保持每天快乐吧，说不定明天就噶了
chunks.en: Happy birthday. I will celebrate it the day after tomorrow, then I will be 28. Just as confused, stay happy every day, maybe I'll die tomorrow

chunks.zh: 生日快乐，加油！
chunks.en: Happy birthday, keep it up!

chunks.zh: 生日快乐
chunks.en: Happy birthday

chunks.zh: 你这生日 4 年过一次
chunks.en: You only celebrate your birthday once every 4 years

chunks.zh: @Geekgogo 生日不是过阴历吗？
chunks.en: @Geekgogo Isn't birthday celebrated by the lunar calendar?

chunks.zh: 生日快乐
chunks.en: Happy Birthday

chunks.zh: @harryWebb 确实，不要后悔没选的另一条路
chunks.en: @harryWebb Indeed, don't regret the path you didn't choose

chunks.zh: 兄弟生日快乐。我跟你同龄，也无房无车无对象，这是我主动选择放弃的，现在我感觉我活的非常好，每天都很开心快乐。
chunks.en: Happy birthday, brother. I am the same age as you, and I have no house, no car, and no partner. This is what I chose to give up. Now I feel that I am living very well, and I am happy every day.
